separator.tiff

purpose: Follow up to the previous mail
key_points: Thanking for the gifts. Telling about family and they are doing fine. Waiting to meet the recipient soon
email:
Dear Sandeep Ji,

Many thanks for sending the calendar and diary of Indian Railways.  There are some excellent photographs, specially that of Katra Station with its LED lights.  Rima has put the calendar in the bedroom shelf.

I met your father last weekend.  I am happy to now that you will be relocating to Brij Vihar shortly.  We will look forward to meet you/family.  Regarding admission of your son at Bal Bharti School, we can help out as required.  Rima checked out informally, their admissions process will start from March 2016. We will get the forms for you and will also reconfirm the dates and admission requirements.  We have met the Vice Principal many times and Rima knows many teachers due to Sahil's work. Sahil is now in Class XI.

If you wish, you can write a 'warm-up letter ' to the school, as a heads-up that you will be seeking admission of your son for Class IX.Rima can hand-deliver this letter to VP so that you get into their radar and become familiar with your case.

We are very happy with the Bal Bharti School and have seen the positive transformation in Sahil's personality over the last several years. Teachers, Principal and school management are mature & progressive, and students are well mannered from good families.

Look forward to see you soon.



Sunil Asthana

Dear Shri Gupta,

Greetings from IIM Ahmedabad

We have an ongoing academic relation with Homi Bhabha National Institute for training senior officers, engineers and scientists across Department of Atomic Energy constituent institutions.

The next program is planned during 22-27 March at IIM Campus with the theme of Leadership for Nuclear Power Corporation engineers. Participants are very senior officers in charge of nuclear power stations across the country.

I will be honored to invite you to share your experience in constructing the prestigious Udhampur-Srinagar-Baramulla Rail Link (USBRL) Project. Your experience in terms of how the project was executed, difficulties faced on account of the project, how the project overcame these difficulties and successfully implemented will be good exposure to the participants. You are free to bring in insights in dealing with government, private and stakeholders in the project frankly.

IIMA will take care of your travel and logistics, and pay a honorarium of Rs 20,000/-.

Your session is planned for 25th March from 11:55am to 1:30/2pm. Mr Sanjay Darshan, marked in the mail will reach out to you and organise the logistics.

I look forward to welcoming you to the campus.

Membership Id of Head

Contributor-(s)  
Membership id-  
Name-  
Relation with Head- Spouse/children of HOF/Parents of HOF/ Spouse’s Parents/siblings of HOF/siblings of spouse  
End date of the Family Pool (Optional)  
Contributor can give their consent to be a part of family pool in the below format in trail mail.

Authorise Head to create and modify the pool.  
Consent of sub-member to join the pool.  
The member should state that they agree to join the Family Pool and read all the terms and conditions regarding the Family Pool on the Air India website.  
Family Pool will be created within 7-14 working days of your request submission.  
We request you to refer to the Air India – Family Pool FAQs section which outline its business rules.
